item.title: PHIL103-lecture-20201024
item.description: The Law and Economics of Internet Access # Innovation and Sec 230 Develop and offer content without fear of legal liability “No provider or user of an interactive computer service shall be treated as the publisher or speaker of any information provided by another information content provider.” Innovation: want to make it likely that we’ll have access to more awesome content. Net neutrality and Title II FCC public utility regulation
